attributes.action: Provide heating subsidies for those on a low income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's no secret that the energy companies are announcing record profits this year. For many people the cost of recent price hikes is simply a burden too far. Those with small children who are on a low income and the pensioners of our country are the victims of these price rises. Gas has gone up 15% but so too has electric in some cases. We shouldnt have an 'Heat or Eat' crisis in a modern country like ours.
